channel.title: osebo :)
channel.description: This is an activity sheet. Quick updates on my design process, projects, workflow and random things that run through my mind

item.title: 12. mr. yuk Web VR
item.description: Currently working with Brendan Luu to create a web virtual reality exhibition. We are exploring creating an exhibit on the topics of art and music. Our goal is to create an experience that makes virtual reality more enjoyable for those who don't have access to all of the hardware needed to use VR. For this reason we are creating a web experience. I have been learning how to create VR experiences with A-Frame. Check out a prototype I have created of Mr. Yuk here.

item.title: 11. Building a web document editor.
item.description: Creating a web document editor that will allow users to easily write what comes to their mind in their browser. Currently the product has multiple pages and I am working on adding local storage for instant saving. Next, I want to add a chrome extension and the ability to embed links.

item.title: 10. eego loading animation
item.description: Created a loading animation for the new eego logo mark. The eyes are blinking.

item.title: 09. Joining Tumblr :)
item.description: Thankful to announce that I will be joining the Tumblr Product Design team. More to come on this journey...

item.title: 08. osebo mark
item.description: That is all.

item.title: 07. Some guy I came across on google maps...
item.description:
Many products overlook their early adopters. Without them, what would their product be? As eego continues to grow, closer to, launch I would like to acknowledge our early adopters by creating a page dedicated to them. It will increase engagement and add incentive to become a part of our growing creative community... More on this in the near future.

This guy agrees.

item.title: 06. What do you see?
item.description: Working on a logo mark concept for a digital product studio. During exploration I created this concept:

item.title: 05. eego V1.01 feed concept.
item.description: Users will have the ability add profile picture, and a coverp photo to their eego. We want users to be proud of their collections, so we are adding the ability to share them. Keeping track of the people users like the most can be difficult so we want to give users the ability to "follow" others. We are experimenting with the word "watching" because it feels less social. The eego logo mark will direct the user to a feed of collected content from people the user is "following" or "watching"... more coming soon on this :)

item.title: 04. Rainbow custom cards and music player
item.description:
Next our team has decided to add custom cards and player to Rainbow, which will allow users to listen to music with out stopping. In addition, custom players will allow us to create light weight music cards which will be easier to load then the soundcloud embeds.

The display below shows how a user selects a person to see their likes and the new player cards on mobile.

item.title: 03. eego - a place to create collections for your workflow.
item.description: After busting my brain a little longer, I came up with eego. We want users collections to resemeble oneself, similar to an eego.
